StringVectorProperty.name: Temp File Path
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The Temp file path is where ParaView will save all downloaded cdf files. The default on *NIX systems is /temp/

IntVectorProperty.name: Minutes to Add
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property will tell the Filter how much time to overshoot on either end of the data request. This allows for extra data to make fitting data properly easier.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRangeInfoStart
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Information on Start Time to Property panel

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRangeInfoEnd
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Information on End Time to Property panel

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property passes time values back to the source

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateGroup
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the Observatory Group Selection.

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateObservatory
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the Observatory Selection.

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateInstrument
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the Instrument Selection.

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateDataSet
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the DataSet Selection.

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateVariables
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the Variable Selection.

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateGroupList
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the Observatory Group Selection.

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateObservatoryList
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the Observatory Selection.

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateInstrumentList
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the Instrument Selection.

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateDataSetList
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the DataSet Selection.

StringVectorProperty.name: SaveStateVariablesList
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This Property is for Saving the State of the Variable Selection.

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeFitHandler
IntVectorProperty.label: Time Fit Handler

Entry.text: Fit to next lower available time

IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select how you would like to fit CDAweb data to your model data. 1) "Fit to Next Lower" will provide data from the closest time less than model time 2) "Fit to Next Upper" will proivde data from the closest time greater than model time 3) "Interpolate Linearly" between the two closest valid data points

IntVectorProperty.name: BadDataHandler
IntVectorProperty.label: Bad Data Handler
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select how you would like to handle bad data within the CDF files. 1) "OMIT" will just not provide the value to the filter 2) "Linear Interpolation" will interpolate over time 3) "Raw Data" will provide data AS-IS from the CDF file

StringVectorProperty.name: SpaceCraftInfoProperties
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the Desired space craft and data sets from NASAs CDAweb.
